mapper.select: select * from votetopic where vs_no = 1 order by vt_no desc
select * from votetopic where vs_no = 2 order by vt_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into votetopic(vt_no,vs_no,vt_content,vt_start,vt_end, vt_img_a, vt_img_b, vt_count_a, vt_count_b) values(seq_votetopic.nextval,1,#{vt_content},sysdate,sysdate+7, #{vt_img_a}, #{vt_img_b}, 0, 0)
mapper.update: update votetopic set vt_content = #{vt_content}, vt_img_a = #{vt_img_a}, vt_img_b = #{vt_img_b} where vt_no = #{vt_no}

update votetopic set vt_count_a = (select count(*) from vote where v_result = 1 and vt_no = #{vt_no}), vt_count_b = (select count(*) from vote where v_result = 2 and vt_no = #{vt_no}) where vt_no = #{vt_no}
